author: Brian Feldman
title: Coronavirus Is Threatening Facebook’s Business Model
description: The company is almost always bulletproof, but a pandemic may be the exception to the rule.
content: In the month since the coronavirus pandemic began exploding across the U.S., Facebook has pledged to spend more than $200 million. Two weeks ago, the company said it would give away $100 million in grants to small businesses affected by the outbreak, and this… [+4563 chars]
